themes: increasing funding access for individual creatives
prioritizing local and regional artists for commissions
redistributing large public art contracts into smaller opportunities
broadening artist participation in public art programs
key_phrases: more lower entry opportunities for individual creatives
prioritize commissioning local and regional artists
break up large AIPP commissions at ABIA
multiple contracts at lower amounts for more artist opportunities
barriers_identified: limited entry opportunities for individual creatives
large commissions restricting access to fewer artists
solutions_proposed: make available more lower entry opportunities for individual creatives to receive funding
prioritize commissioning local and regional artists for AIPP commissions
break up large AIPP commissions at ABIA to multiple contracts at lower amounts for more artist opportunities
